text: Ic andette þe, Drihten ælmihtig God, & sanctam Marian, þinre haligan modor, & eallum haligum & þe, bisceop, ealle mine synna, þe ic earminge fram minre iuguðe oð þas tid ongean Godes gesetnysse gefremede, on gyfernisse & on druncennysse, & on unrihthæmede & on galnysse, on unrotnysse & on asolcennysse, & on yrre & on yfelre gewylnunge, on andan & on yfelnisse, on hatunge & on geflitfulnysse, on mænan aðe & on swicolnysse, on leasunge & on ydele wuldre, on modignysse, on gesihðe & on leahtre, on gehernesse & on swæcce, on stynce & on hrepunge, on leasre gewitnysse, on gytsunge & on manslihte & on æræte & on oferfylle & on eallum þweorum dædum.

For þam ic bydde þe, sanctam Mariam, ures Drihtenes modor & sanctum Michaelem þone heahengel & sanctum Petrum mid eallum apostolum & sanctum Stephanum mid eallum martirum & ealle Cristes andetras & ealle halige & gecorene fæmnan & þe, bisceop, þæt ge gebiddan for me, þam unwurþestan synfullan, to þam ælmihtigan Gode, þæt he us for urum synnum miltsige.
Gemyltsige eow se ælmihtiga God & forgife eow ealle eowre synna & alyse eow fram eallum yfelum dædum & gehealde eow fram eallum synnum.
& gelæde us Crist, þæs lifiendan Godes sunu, into þam ecean life, Amen.
